thought: To craft a pink_banner, I need to create a pink wool checkerboard pattern on the crafting table. The first ingredient required is stick, which can be crafted from bamboo. Therefore, I will first move the bamboo from slot 35 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1
